DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine prevalence treatment rate T. vaginalis , C. trachomatis , N. gonorrhoeae woman seek emergency contraception urine pregnancy test Magee-Womens Hospital outpatient clinic use non-invasive urine STD test .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Invasive Sexually Transmitted Disease Testing Women Seeking Emergency Contraception Urine Pregnancy Testing
DOC.detailed_description: This study three primary objective : 1 ) determine prevalence T. vaginalis , C. trachomatis , N. gonorrhoeae woman seek emergency contraception urine pregnancy test - population likely increase risk acquire STDs ; 2 ) determine rate successful treatment woman diagnose STDs venue .
DOC.criteria: Females least age 15 time enrollment present MageeWomens Hospital emergency contraception urine pregnancy test . Ability provide write informed consent . Diagnosis and/or treatment STD within 4 week enrollment study .
